title: Request an IRS Private Letter Ruling
description: A company is about to undertake a complex transaction with unclear tax consequences and wants a binding ruling from the IRS in advance.

tasks.description: Research the issue to confirm the IRS will issue a ruling on this type of transaction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the issue is not on the IRS's no-rule list.

tasks.description: Draft a detailed request for a Private Letter Ruling (PLR), including a full statement of facts and legal analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a comprehensive legal document for the IRS.

tasks.description: Submit the PLR request to the IRS National Office along with the required user fee.
